Verses: 1 dhaaveedhin Naatkalil Moondru Varusham Oyaadha Panjam Undaayirundhadhu; Appozhudhu Dhaaveedhu Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Visaariththaan; Karththar: Kibiyoniyaraik Kondrupotta Savulukkaagavum, Raththappiriyaraana Avan Veettaarukkaagavum Idhu Undaayitru Endraar.

2 appozhudhu Raajaa: Kibiyoniyarai Azhaippiththaan; Kibiyoniyaro, Isravel Puththiraraayiraamal Emoriyaril Meedhiyaayirundhavargal; Avargalukku Isravel Puththirar Aanaiyittirundhum, Savul Isravel Puththirarukkaagavum Yoodhaavukkaagavum Kaanbiththa Vairaakkiyaththinaal Avargalai Vetta Vagaithedinaan.

3 aagaiyaal Dhaaveedhu Kibiyoniyaraip Paarththu: Naan Ungalukku Seyyavendiyadhu Enna? Neengal Karththarudaiya Sudhandharaththai Aaseervadhikkumpadikku, Naan Seyyavendiya Praayachchiththam Enna Endru Kettaan.

4 appozhudhu Kibiyoniyar Avanaip Paarththu: Savulodum Avan Veettaarodum Engalukku Irukkira Kaariyaththirkaaga Engalukku Velliyum Ponnum Thevaiyillai; Isravelil Oruvanaik Kondrupodavendum Enbadhum Engal Viruppam Alla Endraargal. Appozhudhu Avan Appadiyaanaal, Naan Ungalukku Enna Seyyavendum Endru Sollugireergal Endru Kettaan.
5 avargal Raajaavai Nokki: Naangal Isravelin Ellaiyilengum Nilaikkaadhapadikku, Azhindhupoga Evan Engalai Nirmoolamaakki Engalukkup Pollaappu Seyya Ninaiththaano,

6 avan Kumaararil Ezhuper Karththar Therindhukonda Savulin Ooraagiya Kibiyaavile Naangal Avargalaik Karththarukkendru Thookkippoda, Engalukku Oppukkodukkappadavendum Endraargal. Naan Avargalai Oppukkoduppen Endru Raajaa Sonnaan.
7 aanaalum Dhaaveedhum Savulin Kumaaranaagiya Yonaththaanum Karththaraikkondu Itta Aanaiyinimiththam, Raajaa Savulin Kumaaranaagiya Yonaththaanin Magan Meviposeththaith Thappavittu,

8 aayaavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Rispaal Savulukkup Petra Avaludaiya Irandu Kumaararaagiya Armoniyaiyum, Meviposeththaiyum, Savulin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Meegaal Mekolaaththiyanaana Parsilaavin Kumaaranaagiya Aadhariyelukkuppetra Avaludaiya Aindhu Kumaararaiyum Pidiththu,

9 avargalaik Kibiyoniyar Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaan; Avargalaik Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Malaiyinmel Thookkippottaargal; Appadiye Avargal Ezhuperum Orumikka Vizhundhaargal; Vaarkodhumai Aruppu Thuvakkugira Aruppukkaalaththin Mundhinanaatkalile Avargal Kondrupodappattaargal.

10 appozhudhu Aayaavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Rispaal Rattuppudavaiyai Eduththukkondupoi, Adhaip Paaraiyinmel Viriththu, Aruppunaalin Thuvakkam Mudharkondu Vaanaththilirundhu Avargalmel Mazhai Peyyumattum Pagalil Aagaayaththup Paravaigalaagilum Iravil Kaattumirugangalaagilum Avargalmel Vizhavottaadhirundhaal.
11 aayaavin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Rispaal Ennum Savulin Marumanaiyaatti Seydhadhu Dhaaveedhukku Arivikkappattapodhu,

12 dhaaveedhu Poi, Pelisthar Kilbovaavile Savulai Vettinapodhu, Pedhsaanin Veedhiyile Thookkippodappattadhum, Keeleyaaththilulla Yaabes Pattanaththaar Ange Poith Thiruttalavaaik Konduvandhadhumaana Savulin Elumbugalaiyum, Avan Kumaaranaana Yonaththaanin Elumbugalaiyum, Avargalidaththilirundhu Eduththu,
13 ange Irundhu Avargalaikkonduvandhu, Thookkippodappattavargalin Elumbugalaiyum Avaigalode Serththu,

14 savulin Elumbugalaiyum Avan Kumaaranaagiya Yonaththaanin Elumbugalaiyum, Benyameen Dhesaththu Selaa Oorilirukkira Avan Thagappanaagiya Keesin Kallaraiyil Adakkampannuviththaan; Raajaa Kattalaiyittapadiyellaam Seydhaargal; Adharkuppinbu Dhevan Dhesaththirkaaga Seyyappatta Vendudhalaik Kettarulinaar.
15 pinbu Pelisthar Isravelinmel Yuththamseydhaargal; Appozhudhu Dhaaveedhum Avanodekooda Avan Sevagarumpoi, Pelistharodu Yuththampanninaargal, Dhaaveedhu Vidaaiththupponaan.

16 appozhudhu Munnooru Sekkalnirai Vengalamaana Eettiyaip Pidikkiravanum, Pudhuppattayaththai Araiyile Kattikkondavanumaana Ispipenop Ennum Raatchadha Puththiraril Oruvan Dhaaveedhai Vettavendumendru Irundhaan.

17 seruyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Abisaai Raajaavukku Udhaviyaaga Vandhu, Pelisthanai Vettik Kondrupottaan. Appozhudhu Dhaaveedhin Manushar: Isravelin Vilakku Anaindhupogaadhapadikku, Neer Ini Engalode Yuththaththirkup Purappadavendaam Endru Avanukku Aanaiyittu Sonnaargal.
18 adharkup Pinbu Pelistharode Thirumbavum Kopile Yuththam Nadandhadhu; Oosaaththiyanaagiya Seebekkaai Raatchadha Sandhadhiyaana Saappai Vettippottaan.

19 pelistharodu Innum Veroruyuththam Kopile Undaanapodhu, Yaareyorkimin Kumaaranaagiya Elkkaanaan Ennum Bethlagemiyan Kaadh Ooraanaagiya Koliyaaththin Sagodharanai Vettinaan; Avan Eettith Thaangaanadhu Neykiravargalin Padaimaram Avvalavu Peridhaayirundhadhu.

20 innum Oru Yuththam Kaadh Oorile Nadandhapodhu, Ange Nettaiyanaana Oru Manushan Irundhaan; Avan Kaigalil Avvaaru Viralgalum Avan Kaalgalil Avvaaru Viralgalum, Aaga Irubaththu Naanku Viralgalullavan; Ivanum Raatchadha Piraviyaayirundhu,
21 isravelai Nindhiththaan; Dhaaveedhin Sagodharanaana Seemeyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yonaththaan Avanai Vettinaan.
22 indha Naaluperum Kaaththoorile Raatchadhanukkup Pirandhavargal; Ivargal Dhaaveedhin Kaiyinaalum Avan Sevagarin Kaiyinaalum Madindhaargal.
